titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Architectural and Engineering Services, Yale University, Records
Architectural and Engineering Services, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:17

did.unittitle: Architectural and Engineering Services, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of files maintained by Yale Architectural and Engineering Services (and its predecessors) concerning the construction and maintenance of Yale facilities. Included are minutes, correspondence, reports, and other records documenting zoning and taxes, building permits, contractors and bids, billing, personnel, energy conservation, biological safety, and alterations.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Architectural and Engineering Services

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 46-A (YRG 46-A), Records and materials broadly documenting Yale buildings, facilities, and grounds.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from Architectural and Engineering Services, 1989-1990.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Architectural and Engineering Services, Yale University, Records (RU 7). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of files maintained by Yale Architectural and Engineering Services (and its predecessors) concerning the construction and maintenance of Yale facilities. Included are minutes, correspondence, reports, and other records documenting zoning and taxes, building permits, contractors and bids, billing, personnel, energy conservation, biological safety, and alterations.

controlaccess.subject: Campus planning
College buildings -- Design and construction
College buildings -- Maintenance and repair
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Architectural and Engineering Services

did.unittitle: Administrative records of Architectural and Engineering Services
Federal and municipal zoning and taxes
Progress report of authorized Engineering Service Requests, 1971-1972
Project status report: miscellaneous, no date
Landscape and redevelopment plan: log and transmittal file, 1970
Yale undergraduate housing: log and transmittal file, 1971
Letter of transmittal re: Berkeley College Electrical, 1982
Letter of transmittal re: Yale University sewer and sprinkler system, 1986
Staff meeting minutes, correspondence re policy
Buildings and Grounds Services: staff meeting minutes, 1975-1977
Procedure for receiving deposits for plans and specifications, 1982
Staff meeting minutes, correspondence re policy (continued)
Consulting policy proposed by George Cash and Dave Safford, 1982
Construction Management: Dick Bush and Dave Safford, 1982
Employee vacation time, job classifications, miscellaneous, 1976-1983
Air system balancing, adjusting, and testing, 1963-1973
Fire ratings, carpets, steel joints, drafting aids, trade literature, 1972-1977
George A. Fuller Company: estimates for Old Campus renovation, 1975-1976
The Jones T. Kerwig Company: estimates for Old Campus renovation, 1976
Illuminating Engineering Society of North America: Lighting Design Award, 1981
Preliminary Engineering and Economic Evaluation of On-Site Production of Electricity and Steam Through Cogeneration (E.E. Linden Assoc.), 1982
Recombinant DNA research: articles and clippings, 1976-1977
Recombinant DNA research: Biological Safety Advisory Committee, 1976-1979
Index of contents: steel file drawers, steel shelving, wooden plan files, [1920-1940?]
Yale properties - accounts, addresses, area codes, 1958, 1963
William M. Hotchkiss Company: insurance map information, no date
Maintenance alterations and engineering services alterations requests, 1968-1969
University Guidebook for Building Construction, no. 15
Standard Performance and Material Specifications for Alterations and Additions
Parsons Brinkerhoff Building Engineering Study (one volume)
Undergraduate Residential Facilities Planning Study (all levels)
Survey of Yale Public Information (continued in Box 1)
Berkeley College Renovation, Project Manual, vol. II
Subjects (Building use, Space allocation, housing, individual buildings)
Topics (property/real estate, space inventory and allocation)
Administrative records for specific buildings and residential colleges
City property maps and university maps

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes services requests and project correspondence.
